dcterms:description: A dataset to evaluate the task of Image Retrieval with Multimodal queries, containing 6k images and 18k textual transformation queries that aim at either replacing scene elements or changing pairwise relationships between scene elements.
dcterms:title: SIMAT

dcterms:description: A dataset connecting language and vision using crowdsourced dense image annotations, providing a rich set of images and annotations for various tasks.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of images with object annotations, designed for object detection and segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: COCO

Lu Jiang
Chen Sun
Kevin Murphy

dcterms:description: A dataset for composing text and image for image retrieval, providing a set of images with textual descriptions.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing around 200k images of fashion products, each annotated with a compact attribute description.
dcterms:title: Fashion200k

Hui Wu
Yupeng Gao

dcterms:description: A dataset designed to advance research on interactive fashion image retrieval, allowing retrieval based on natural language feedback.
dcterms:title: Fashion-IQ

dcterms:creator: Phillip Isola
Joseph J Lim
Edward H Adelson
dcterms:description: A dataset of images annotated with object/noun labels and state/adjective labels, designed for discovering states and transformations in image collections.
dcterms:title: MIT-States

dcterms:description: A dataset referenced as a previous work, containing images annotated with actor-action-environment triplets.
dcterms:title: SIC112
